tool_description: Estimates soil moisture levels based on precipitation, temperature, evapotranspiration, and soil characteristics for irrigation planning.

soil_type.description: Soil classification: clay, loam, sand, silt, or clay_loam

wind_speed_kmh.description: Wind speed in kilometers per hour

days_since_rain.description: Number of days since last significant rainfall

crop_cover.description: Vegetation cover: bare, sparse, moderate, or dense

usage: Input soil type, recent weather conditions, and time factors. Optional crop cover and initial moisture help refine estimates. Returns soil moisture levels and irrigation recommendations.
